resources.string: This skill currently supports only Mandarin Chinese
小爱可以帮助你方便快捷的输入各种常用信息
例如：北京市海淀区小米科技园
该功能必须登录才能使用
想让小爱帮你输入的文字：
安全提醒：请不要记录您的密码等安全信息
小爱拿起了笔，试试说：“输入xxx”
Mi AI can autofill info for you
这里小爱输入不了呢，会尽快支持哦
点击太多次啦，小爱反应不过来了
你好像没有说对哦，现在长按AI键再说一次吧
好像出问题了，我们进行下一步吧
你好像还是没说对，我们进行下一步吧
Press and hold AI button to talk. Release to get an answer.
Teach Mi AI a new skill
"I don't know how to do this yet. Try something else?"
Record your command to be able to execute the corresponding task automatically next time you press the AI button.
Record your command to be able to execute the corresponding task automatically next time you press the AI button.
"Mi AI can't complete such tasks directly"
Sign in to your Mi Account first
"选中文本输入区域 唤起小爱，进入小爱文本输入模式"
"此时对小爱说“输入小米科技” 即可将“小米科技”输入文本框"
"在“小爱设置>快捷短语”中 例如，设置“我的邮箱”为 xiaoai@xiaomi.com"
"选中需要输入的区域 对小爱说“输入我的邮箱” “xiaoai@xiaomi.com”将被输入"
连接耳机，智能调音已失效
驾车模式，智能调音已失效

"特殊情况：在连接耳机、开启驾车模式时，智能调音不生效
注意事项：说话时与麦克风保持确定的距离，有助于提升智能调音效果"
"Adjust Mi AI's response volume to ambient noise and your voice"
"Adjust Mi AI's response volume to ambient noise and your voice"
蓝牙已经自动连接上了
How to talk to Mi AI using a Bluetooth device
好像出了点问题听不到你的声音，过会儿再试试吧
请先允许%1$s使用数据流量播放
发现可连接的%1$s, 点击确认去连接
Mi AI will sync the travel info from your Mi AI Speaker.
Connect to Mi AI Bluetooth Speaker Lite
对小爱说的话中存在空格或其他非法字符喔～
对小爱说的话最多30个字,并且存在空格或其他非法字符喔～
还没添加小爱的回应呢，并且对小爱说的话中存在空格或其他非法字符喔～
还没添加对小爱说的话呢
问法不能超过30个字，请删减后重新提交
小爱的回应中存在空格或其他非法字符喔～
还没添加对小爱说的话和小爱的回应呢
注：“录屏教学”与其它回应暂不支持同时添加
技能信息不全或含有非法字符(红色标出)，请修改后重试！
示例1：小爱早上好 示例2：最讨人喜欢的星座是哪个
无法添加重复的设备指令！
Voice assistant has been replaced with Mi AI. Now you can play your favorite music or videos just by saying a few words. More features are coming soon. Learn more about Mi AI now?
你好，我是小爱同学语音助手，这是我首次搭载在小米平板上，你可以语音问我各种问题，快来了解我的功能吧。
当前版本不支持显示此功能
引导过程中小爱暂不能唤醒
引导过程中小爱暂时不能唤醒
Your Mi AI Bluetooth Speaker Lite needs a firmware update.
"1. After you switch to a local dialect, Mi AI will recognize Standard Mandarin worse. 2. You'll still have to use Mandarin voice command to open Mi AI."
After you switch to a local dialect, Mi AI will recognize Standard Mandarin worse.
Select the dialect of Chinese you speak
要我为你做什么？例如，您可以说导航回家，今天天气
Please edit on the latest version
抱歉，您提交的文字中包含不和谐词汇，请修改后重试
已存在相同问法的训练，请修改后重试
你还可以对我说，屏蔽他
Enter a valid license plate number
应用还没安装，快去安装应用吧
应用已经不支持这个功能啦
应用版本太低啦，快去升级吧
"That's all Mi AI can do for now."
"Sorry, Mi AI doesn't learn this skill."
"Mi Music couldn't play a song from favorites"
描述你所遇到的问题吧～
"Mi AI's version is too old. Let's update."
已收到%1$s的%2$s微信，这个群消息太多啦后续就不再提醒你啦
驾驶模式中，你可以这么说：
时想完成的小爱任务，比如:
Long press the home key for half a second, talk to Mi AI, and get an answer right away
Tap the Home screen shortut to learn more about Mi AI
Press and hold the Power buton to open Mi AI
Press and hold the Power button for half a second, talk to Mi AI, and get an answer right away
单击AI键或者语音都可以快速唤醒
只要单击AI键后松手，或者对我说小爱同学并说出你的指令，小爱就可以识别你的声音，一句话搞定手机复杂操作
Both voice and power button can open Mi AI
Press and hold the Power button for half a second or just say \"Mi AI\" to ask for something
Press and hold the Power button for half a second, talk to Mi AI, and get an answer right away
Press and hold the Power button for half a second, talk to Mi AI, and get an answer right away
To learn what else I can do, say:
Mi AI currently supports only Mandarin Chinese
Allow Mi AI to learn new skills
Open the app, then tap \"My skills\" > \"Create skill\".
Enter your command and tap \"Teach Mi AI\".
"Allow Mi AI to record the actions you'd like it to perform in the future and tap \"Finish\". Save the new skill and try to use the new voice command."
切换了用户空间，停止录制！
点击录屏开始录屏教学
预约订座需要先下载%1$s哦
"Hi there! I'm Mi AI. I'm your smart voice assistant."
"Couldn't sync info. Check your network connection and try again."
A voice engine error occurred, try again later.
别松手啊，按住说话，再松手
继续长按我才能听清你的话哦
You can set Mi AI to respond after you press and hold the Home button.
Press and hold the Menu button to start
小爱需要安装米家授权组件才能控制智能设备哦，现在就去安装吧！
要控制智能家庭设备，请允许小爱获取必要权限
Mi AI can track packages using phone numbers
随机执行一个响应(仅支持一句话或一段录音)
小爱先退啦，需要再喊我
This song is already in your favorites
小爱同学努力帮你找到了这些资源哦
The version of Mi Music is too old
"You haven't set up text-to-speech engine yet, set up now?"
"Mi Video's version is too old. Let's update."
"Couldn't record. Allow voice assistant to record audio in Security."
"Couldn't find Mi AI Bluetooth Speaker Lite"
"There aren't any songs in Mi Music's favorites"
In order not to affect your call experience,Mi AI will not be waked up during the call.
小爱教学服务正在后台运行
"Press the button on the device or use your phone to trigger Mi AI"
要控制智能家庭设备，请允许小爱获取必要权限
找到%1$s，正在拨打最近呼出号码
Mi AI currently supports only Mandarin Chinese
Mi AI only works with Simplified Chinese. You can use Mandarin or switch to your local dialect to talk to Mi AI.
Allow Mi AI to learn new skills
Record command sequences to teach Mi AI how to perform actions
How to teach Mi AI new skills

In order for you to use all the features, Xiao Ai students need to connect to the network, locate, call recording, read contacts, read SMS, read call records, and collect, process and use your personal information. The %1$s details how we will handle your information. Select Agree and Continue below to indicate that you agree with the privacy policy of your loved one.
Delete failed! Please check whether the network is abnormal or whether this skill is in shared audit.
确定要删除该项技能吗？
分享失败！该技能已提交审核。
您今天分享的次数已达上限，请明天再来
是否共享此技能给小爱同学？审核通过后会分享给所有用户使用
Place the phone to your ear to start
Sign in to your Mi Account first
How to force reboot your device
Press and hold the Power button until your device reboots
How to open the shutdown page
Press and hold the Power button for 3s
Press and hold the Power button for 0.5s. Release to talk.
Waking Mi AI using the Power button on full display devices
开启电源键唤醒小爱同学
Say \"Mi AI\" into your phone to activate Mi AI voice assistant
Say \"Mi AI\" into your phone when the screen is on to activate Mi AI voice assistant
小爱训练计划，创建您的专属训练
共享成功的训练，还可以被千万用户一起使用哦～
抱歉，此功能模块加载出错，试着重新提问一下吧
此功能正在更新，两分钟之后试着再问我一下
哎呀，需要下载一下才能体验哦~
%1$s给你发了%2$s微信,可能有急事,是否考虑读出来?

To understand your needs and improve product services, Mi AI sincerely invite you to join us in%1$s.
